Love Aaj Kal

Ano: 2020

IMDb ID: tt10023024

Sinopse: The word 'Love' itself brings along with it a plethora of feelings and meanings, which has constantly changed overtime.While the expression of love has changed over the years gone by, does the emotion still remain the same? Has anybody figured out the perfect path towards love? Love Aaj Kal is a movie that tackles this ever-changing dynamic of being in and finding love. Our protagonists, Veer and Zoe traverse this tricky path of love while trying their luck in finding the answers to these questions.—PranavLalpuria
